name: BrioHR
headline: All-in-one HR management platform for SMEs
description:
Our HR management platform helps companies instantly digitize all HR functions across the full employee journey, all in one place:
- talent acquisition: digitize and collaborate over recruitments with our ATS (applicant tracking system), then onboard your new joiners fully digitally
- HR admin: manage paid time off, employee database and documents, payroll (for Singapore and Malaysia, more to come!), expense claims, timesheets...
- Performance management: track KPIs / OKRs, manage performance appraisal, gather 360° feedback...

founders.name: Benjamin Croc, Founder
founders.description:
French having lived 10 years in Malaysia from where I cofounded BrioHR.

Started my career with PwC then moved to Malaysia in early 2011 to head a global finance division for a French MNC, before getting an MBA at Insead (16J). Came back to Malaysia after that to join McKinsey up until the birth of my daughter, then switched to Lazada (Alibaba Group) in early 2018 before becoming obsessive about the need for BrioHR in the region :)

Avid player of badminton, squash, poker...

Do reach out!

founders.name: Nabil Oudghiri, Founder
founders.description: Grew up in Morocco, studied engineering and worked in France, went to Singapore for my MBA and now living in Malaysia where I cofounded BrioHR!

BrioHR is a comprehensive HR management platform designed specifically for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Founded in 2018 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, BrioHR is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and has a nimble team of 35 dedicated employees.

Their mission is crystal clear: to streamline and digitize all aspects of HR management in one place, thereby enhancing efficiency throughout the employee journey—from recruitment to retirement. BrioHR’s suite of tools includes:

- **Talent Acquisition:** Their applicant tracking system (ATS) helps firms easily collaborate during recruitment and seamlessly onboard new hires digitally.
- **HR Administration:** This feature covers everything from managing employee databases, payroll (currently supporting Singapore and Malaysia), expense claims, and time-off requests.
- **Performance Management:** Track performance metrics (KPIs/OKRs), conduct appraisals, and collect 360-degree feedback, all in an integrated environment.

BrioHR proudly serves over 1,000 companies, empowering HR departments to shift from mundane administrative tasks to strategic contributions that drive business performance. Their USP lies in providing a user-friendly, scalable, and fully integrated SaaS solution tailored to the unique challenges faced by SMEs.

If you're curious about the specifics or want to see how it works in action, you can request a demo or learn more by visiting their website at [BrioHR](https://briohr.com/). With BrioHR, SMEs can discover a smarter way to manage human resources today.
